meanings.definition: The outer parts of a town or city.
meanings.sent1: Many people prefer to live in the outskirts of the city for a quieter lifestyle.
meanings.sent2: We took a walk on the outskirts of town to enjoy the fresh air.
meanings.sent3: The outskirts of the city are like a peaceful haven away from the hustle and bustle.
meanings.sent4: As the sun set on the outskirts, the sky turned a beautiful shade of pink.
meanings.sent5: The outskirts of the town stretched out like a calm sea of green.

meanings.definition: The outer edge of an area.
meanings.sent1: The campground is located on the outskirts of the forest.
meanings.sent2: She built her house on the outskirts of the village, surrounded by fields.
meanings.sent3: The outskirts of the park are where the squirrels have their secret acorn stash.
meanings.sent4: The outskirts of the desert seemed to shimmer in the heat of the day.
meanings.sent5: The outskirts of the lake were teeming with wildlife and colorful flowers.
